name: Wolf Pack Menace
dialogs: These wolves are unlike anything we've seen before!
They're organized, vicious, and they've already claimed several victims.
The trade routes won't be safe until someone deals with this pack.
Good work tracking them! You're getting close to their territory.
Taking out their scouts was smart - it should disrupt their hunting patterns.
The alpha is dead! The pack will scatter without their leader.
Travelers and merchants can use these roads safely once again. Well done!
